attributes.action: YOU DONT SEND FATHERS TO PRISON WHO DO NOT WANT TO BOTHER, SO HOW CAN YOU TELL MOTHERS YOU WILL SEND THEM TO PRISON OR TAKE THERE CHILDREN
attributes.additional_details:
YOU DONT SEND FATHERS TO PRISON WHO DO NOT WANT TO BOTHER WITH THERE CHILDREN,

 SO HOW CAN YOU TELL MOTHERS YOU WILL SEND THEM TO PRISON OR TAKE THERE CHILDREN IF THEY DO NOT TAKE THERE CHILDREN FOR CONTACT

WE WANT THE GOVERMENT TO STOP THIS NOW
THE ONLY PERSON WHO CAN SAY THIS IS WRONG IS THE CHILD AS THERE IS NO EVIDENCE THERE WILL BE ANY HARM TO THE CHILD WHERE THE MOTHER IS FOUND TO BE LOVING, CONSISTENT AND PREDICTABLE
